usage.cn: 我愿成为一双翅膀，让你的心飞翔于云端。
usage.eng: I'll be the wings that keep your heart in the clouds.

usage.cn: 人生苦短，光阴易逝。活在当下，其他神马都是浮云……
usage.eng: Life is so short and time is fleeting .Live in the present,all the things are of no consequence just like floating clouds.

usage.cn: 当你的心真的在痛，眼泪快要流下来的时候，那就赶快抬头看看，这片曾经属于我们的天空；当天依旧是那么的广阔，云依旧那么的潇洒，那就不应该哭，因为我的离去，并没有带走你的世界。
usage.eng: When you feel hurt and your tears are gonna to drop. Please look up and have a look at the sky once belongs to us. If the sky is still vast,clouds are still clear, you shall not cry because my leave doesn't take away the world that belongs to you.
